description:
On the trail, on the patio, on the other side of the world – these light, tough pants are everything you need for summer action. The breathable stretch fabric moves with you, so you’re always comfortable and in good company. When the temperature climbs, zip off the legs and voila! Instant shorts.

  • Made of recycled nylon with spandex for stretch. DWR finish sheds spills and splashes
  • Curved waistband follows the natural shape of the hips and provides a contoured fit to keep the pants in place
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees support a wide range of motion
  • Zip fly with metal button closure and belt loops
  • 2 front slash pockets with mesh pocket bags for ventilation, 2 back pockets and a side zippered pocket
  • Zip-off legs have contrast zippers so you can tell right from left. Shorts inseam is 10in
name: Patagonia Quandary Convertible Pants - Men's
